details.name: e
details.description: a very simple enemy that moves back and forth on a platform.
details.additionalInfo: its only damage source is direct contact, so avoid touching it!

details.name: square root
details.description: a fast moving enemy that charges in one direction.
details.additionalInfo: try jumping over it or killing it before it reaches you!

details.name: portal
details.description: teleports any entity to a target portal.

details.name: mirror
details.description: reflects all projectiles in an angle determined by the mirror.
details.additionalInfo: anything reflected can target any entity, so your own attacks may damage you!

details.name: spikes
details.description: a deadly trap that instantly kills the entity that touched it.
